snippet.title: eXo Platform - Social Collaboration
snippet.description: The Open Source Enterprise Social Platform

snippet.title: Media Converter
snippet.description: Media Converter is a plugin based video and audio converter. It uses ffmpeg as it's engine, which allows it to convert to a lot of formats.

snippet.title: VLC media player
snippet.description: VLC mediaplayer, the best free media player for video and DVDs

snippet.title: PS3 Media Server
snippet.description: PS3 Media Server is a DLNA-compliant UPnP Media Server

snippet.title: XBMC Media Center
snippet.description: XBMC Media Center is a free cross-platform media player software and entertainment system application framework for Linux, Mac, and Windows. XBMC is capable of playing back and streaming all popular video, audio, and picture formats out-of-the-box.

snippet.title: Social Networks Visualizer
snippet.description: A social network analysis and visualization tool

snippet.title: xbmc Media Manager
snippet.description: Web application to manage XBMC Media database.
